name: Overcooked original level design
description:
These are 3 fanmade Overcooked levels built inside Unreal Engine 4.

It comes with a level design document indicating the different levels and their phases if there are.

Developers notes

It was a level design project we did during our 3rd year of game design course in e-artsup Lyon, in France, with Linagur and Lucas MERAZZI LOPEZ. You can download the exercise sheet as well.

It took us 4 days to design, draw and build the levels.
